availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Milton A. Cartwright (Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Allen Cartwright. . Farmer in Caldwell County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Caldwell County in 1860. Killed by shooting by Thomas B. Wadlington in Caldwell County, Kentucky in January 1860.

ab.bibl:
National Archives and Records Administration (NARA); Washington, D.C.; Federal Mortality Census Schedules, 1850-1880, and Related Indexes, 1850-1880; Archive Collection: T655; Archive Roll Number: 14; Census Year: 1860; Census Place: Caldwell, Kentucky; Page: 83
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell, District 2, p. 361B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Mortality Schedules, Kentucky, Caldwell, p. 83.
